JOOMLA TEMPLATE FOR

Construction, Architect, Interior Design and Mining Industry

Build Websites For All Kinds

This template is dedicated to create websites for construction companies and similar services. But you can build websites of any type, because more than a simple template it is a kit that includes Useful Classes (paddings, margins, borders, backgrounds, colors, ready to use), Bootstrap, Helix Ultimate and SP Page Builder PRO with 63+ addons, each addon with many styles. Best of all with Real Time editor. Esy to use, Watch Video.

READY TO USE

Prebuilt Websites

With 4 pre-built sites for construction, design, and the mining industry, you can create your new or your client’s in a few hours.

BUILT WITH

Latest Technologies

This template is built using modern technologies for website creation. With features like drag & drop, live editor and others for a better user experience.

Helix Ultimate

Helix Ultimate is the best template framework for Joomla. It’s a user-friendly, modern, and highly customizable. Add, revome, reorder and configure each part of your site.

UNIQUE & UNLIMITED

Projects Pages

The project pages are native of Joomla, with unique designs, options for number of columns for desktop, tablet and phones. Show/Hide filters, intro text; add an image gallery for each project, add or remove project details; option to order by creation date, publish date, popularity, etc. All these features give you unlimited possibilities to show your projects to the world.

4 HEADERS

Many Appearences

Each header change of appearance according to the configuration you choose. You can deactivate everything you see and publish your modules in all positions including the menu.
